alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:22PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Delta, southwestern Lamar and southeastern Fannin Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 922 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roxton, or 15 miles southwest of Paris, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Roxton, Big Creek Lake, Forest Hill, Ladonia, Pecan Gap, Windom, Glory, Pacio, Bug Tussle, Petty, Taylor Town, Brookston, Atlas, Noble, Broadway Junction, Allens Chapel, Allens Point and Dial. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
